body.name: SOMEET Ergonomic Office Chair Home Office Desk Chair with Lumbar Support High Back Mesh Office Chair Computer Desk Chair, Adjustable Headrest & Flip-Up Armrest, Black
features: Ergonomics - Taking into consideration the physiological structure and movement patterns of the human body, SOMEET ergonomic office chair features a dual backrest and high-back design that mimics the curvature of the human spine. The office desk chair provides ample support, reducing pressure on the spine, neck, and lower back, consequently lowering the risk of health problems associated with poor sitting posture.

Adjustable Backrest and Height - The backrest can be easily adjusted to various recline angles, accommodating different sitting scenarios and postures. The mesh office desk chair’s height can be effortlessly adjusted using a gas lift mechanism, ensuring a smooth transition for users of various heights.

Adjustable Headrest and Armrests - The headrest of high back office chair is adjustable both in height, allowing a 3-inch range, and can rotate up to 45°, preventing forward slouching and shoulder compression. The armrests of home office desk chairs can be flipped back and rotated 90°, conveniently tucking away under a desk, saving space in your office or home.

Lumbar Support and Easy Assembly - Equipped with spring-loaded lumbar support, our compute desk chair feature provides enhanced protection for your lumbar region, reducing the risk of lumbar strain. Additionally, this ergonomic chair includes tools and instructions for a straightforward assembly process, which can be completed within 30 minutes. Our customer support team is also readily available to assist with any questions.

Breathability and Durability - The mesh office chair boasts an extra-wide seat cushion designed to accommodate various body types. Its high-density padding remains soft and resilient over prolonged use, preventing sagging and deformation, thereby reducing pressure on the hips and tailbone. The ergonomic desk chair’s skin-friendly, breathable mesh design has moisture-wicking capabilities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Value computer chair: Comfortable, Durable, and Budget-Friendly
reviews.reviewText: I'm thoroughly impressed with this computer chair! Assembly was a breeze, taking only minutes to set up. The comfort is exceptional, ideal for long hours at the desk, and it's remarkably supportive for posture. Despite its affordable price, the chair doesn't compromise on quality - it's sturdy and well-crafted. A fantastic choice for anyone seeking a high-quality, budget-friendly office chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gift for my mother
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas gift for my mother whose complained about her old office chair and she just loves the chair, it’s comfortable, sturdy and supportive plus she likes the girly pink color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent chair, comfortable seat
reviews.reviewText: Pretty pink office chair matches my pink cat and dog grroming station. I foster cats, and needed a dedicated, comfortable seat, and wheels to roll round from. The cushion is medium firm, is still comfortable and supportive three months later. I like the feel of the mesh, and the lumbar support. Being able to lift the armrests out of the way is very useful, depending on whether I need to move them out of the way for grooming a larger dog, or if they are in the grroming hammock I can rest my arms. The head rest does not work for me as it sits too far forward and pushes my spine out of alignment - I cannot sit up straight with it but at least it's removable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great office chair for the price
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been sitting on it for a week and I’m happy with the experience. The lumber support works well for me who has frequent lumber pains.The padded seat cushion is soft and comfortable to sit on for a long period of time. Height adjustment is good but the arm rests cannot move, not a big problem though cuz they are pretty soft to lean your arm on. Head rest is great with a good amount of adjustment available.It took me less than 20 mins to assemble the chair, the instruction is clear and easy. Overall a good purchase and I’m super happy with my new chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not my chair (anymore), but I’m making it my problem.
reviews.reviewText: Though it genuinely pains me to admit this, aesthetics aren’t everything. This chair might be pink and seem cuter than its bulky brothers and sisters that are the opposite of cute. It is also poorly made and wildly uncomfortable. You can find something better, and your back will thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a good chair. I do like the seat comfort. The lower back support is not adjustable but provides some support and is still comfortable. My primary concern is with the strength of the arm supports if you put a lot of your weight on the arm rests when either sitting down or standing up. It crackles a little and seems to strain under the weight but hasn't broken yet. I feel like I need to be careful with the arms for that. Otherwise, I'm enjoying the comfort of this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute pink color
reviews.reviewText: I love the cute pink color that this chair is. My daughter absolutely fell in love with it. It does take some time to get it correctly, assembled following the included instructions. But it pays off in the end. it is super comfortable, it rolls smoothly and easily across the floor. The headrest feels good on the back of my head and I like that it has height adjustability as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a replacement for another mid-back chair.I assembled this chair by myself in approximately 20 minutes. The assembly was straightforward, considering it only required tightening over a dozen screws. It was not a labor-intensive task.I have found it to be very comfortable and it supports my back well. It moves around smoothly. The mesh back keeps my back from getting too hot. It's really cost-effective to get a chair of this quality for around a hundred dollars. I would highly recommend.
